channel.title: Need help please
channel.description: Alright so i downloaded Jdk and everything and everyone is talking about client.java or whatever...but i can't seem to find mine i have created Path and i have jdk running but i cant open any files besides running the client/ server and compile please help

item.title: Need help please

item.title: Need help please

item.description:
@Rawr_is_me wrote:

[quote=“lostmyphat, post:6, topic:422234”][quote author=Rawr is me link=topic=524905.msg3820805#msg3820805 date=1321751695]

You are making no sense
[/quote]alright im sorry im not making to much sense but i cannot open the file to change the ip or anything like that…it wont let me open it it just says i cant open it and i want to learn how to open files so i can change the ip or where to find client.java

Right click the file and go to “open with” and set it to notepad.[/quote]
alright so i did that now what do i do?
